title: This Is Push: New Stories from the Edge
description: An anthology of new writing from the authors published over the first five years of PUSH, timed for the fifth anniversary in February 2007.contributing authors:Patricia McCormick, Kevin Brooks, Chris Wooding, Markus Zusak, Brian James, Kristen Kemp,Eireann Corrigan, Christopher Krovatin, Billy Merrell, Matthue Roth, Kevin Waltman, Samantha Schutz, Coe Booth
author: Inc Scholastic
